name: Spectrum Community Services Meals on Wheels
description: Spectrum Community Services delivers Meals on Wheels to seniors in central and east Contra Costa County, helping older adults maintain independence and nutrition at home.
fullDescription: Spectrum Community Services delivers Meals on Wheels to seniors in central and east Contra Costa County, helping older adults maintain independence and nutrition at home.
whatTheyOffer:
- Home-delivered meals for seniors 60+
- Available for those unable to prepare food
- Nutrition designed for older adults
- Friendly volunteer visits
- Sliding scale donations accepted
howToGetIt: Call Spectrum Community Services to apply. You must be 60+ and unable to prepare your own meals due to health or mobility limitations.
keywords: Spectrum Community Services, Meals on Wheels, Contra Costa, home delivered meals, senior meals, homebound, nutrition
